articles.title: Rupee Hits Record Low Against Dollar Amid Global Market Volatility
articles.summary: The Indian Rupee depreciated to 83.45 against the US Dollar, marking a new all-time low. RBI intervention in currency markets provided temporary support, but analysts predict continued pressure from widening trade deficits and strong dollar demand. Import-dependent sectors face increased cost pressures.

articles.title: Parliament Passes Landmark Digital Personal Data Protection Bill
articles.summary: The Lok Sabha approved the Digital Personal Data Protection Bill with strong cross-party support. The legislation establishes comprehensive data privacy frameworks, user consent requirements, and penalties for violations. Tech industry leaders welcomed the clarity while raising concerns about compliance timelines for existing platforms.

articles.title: ISRO Successfully Tests Reusable Launch Vehicle Technology
articles.summary: Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) completed a successful autonomous landing test of its Reusable Launch Vehicle (RLV) at the Aeronautical Test Range in Karnataka. The RLV-TD achieved precise runway landing after a high-altitude drop test. This milestone advances India's efforts to develop cost-effective space transportation systems.

articles.title: Monsoon Forecast: IMD Predicts Normal Rainfall for 2025 Season
articles.summary: The India Meteorological Department (IMD) released its preliminary monsoon forecast, predicting normal rainfall at 96-104% of the long-period average. Agricultural sectors welcomed the forecast, with expectations of strong Kharif crop production. However, IMD warned of potential regional variations and advised preparedness for localized extreme weather events.

articles.title: India Defeats Australia by 6 Wickets in Third Test at MCG
articles.summary: Team India secured a commanding victory in the Boxing Day Test at the Melbourne Cricket Ground, taking a 2-1 lead in the five-match series. Virat Kohli's century (112 off 186 balls) anchored the chase of 287 runs. The win keeps India's hopes alive for retaining the Border-Gavaskar Trophy on Australian soil.

articles.title: New TB Vaccine Shows 80% Efficacy in Phase 3 Trials
articles.summary: Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) announced breakthrough results from Phase 3 trials of a novel tuberculosis vaccine. The vaccine demonstrated 80% efficacy in preventing active TB disease among high-risk populations. India accounts for 27% of global TB burden, making this development particularly significant for public health goals.

citations.title: TB Vaccine: What It Means for India

articles.title: Reliance Jio Launches 5G-Enabled Smart City Project in Pune
articles.summary: Reliance Jio partnered with Pune Municipal Corporation to deploy a comprehensive smart city infrastructure powered by 5G networks. The project includes IoT-enabled traffic management, environmental sensors, and public Wi-Fi zones covering 250 square kilometers. The initiative aims to improve urban governance and citizen services through real-time data analytics.
